programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Sains Ep10
programme.desc: Meneliti cara menganalisis soalan dan kata kuncinya. Soalan yang lebih mencabar daripada Bahagian C turut dibincang untuk markah penuh . Ikuti contoh soalan dan latihan menjawab .

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Sains Ep11
programme.desc: Membincangkan cara menghurai dan menjawab soalan , mengenali soalan yang mungkin dikemukaan dalam bahagian ini dan cara terbaik mendapatkan markah penuh.

programme.title: Mountain Gun Fight Zombies
programme.desc: Wannabe-tomb raiders Tiger and Pole have failed in their latest attempt. On the way home, they are suspected of being thieves and end up in the lock-up of a village overrun by zombies!

programme.title: Rumah Angker Pondok Indah
programme.desc: A family is brutally murdered in their own house. Ever since then, their ghosts linger, terrorising every family that moves into the house. When a new family moves in, history repeats itself.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a squatter settlement in Kuala Lumpur are haunted by the souls of Japanese soldiers perished during World War II.

programme.title: Blok 404
programme.desc: Horror and romance collide at a guesthouse, where various incidents come to a head on a very eventful BBQ night.

programme.title: Nini Thowok
programme.desc: A film about Nadine and her sister Naya who inherit an inn in Solo, West Java from their later grandmother and are forced to keep it open.

programme.title: Sesat: Yang Sudah Pergi Jangan Dipanggil
programme.desc: Amara cuba untuk berhubung dengan arwah ayahnya untuk kali terakhir melalui upacara ritual yang akhirnya membinasakan diri sendiri.

programme.title: Kudzu Zombies
programme.desc: When an agrochemical company tests its latest pesticide, the folks of a small town in the American South are turned into zombies. It is left to crop duster pilot Lonnie to lead the survivors to safety.

programme.title: Hantu Judi
programme.desc: Jason seorang tahi judi menjumpai mayat wanita beserta wang tunai yang banyak di sisi mayat. Dia mengambil wang tersebut namun roh wanita tersebut mengekornya dan meminta bantuan untuk mencari pembunuhnya.

programme.title: Jamuan Setan
programme.desc: A victim of horrific bullying ends up killing herself in school. However, her restless and angry spirit continues to haunt the schoolgrounds to wreak revenge on the bulliers.

programme.title: Misteri Dilaila Versi 1
programme.desc: When Jefri and his wife, Dilaila, go on vacation to the mansion of Dilaila's late father, strange things start to happen, resulting in his wife going missing.

programme.title: Jailangkung 2

programme.title: Panorama

programme.title: Eksplorasi Seni Kraf

programme.title: Hantu Punya Bos!
